runs.comm: starts with a bouncer a street down the leg side. Called wide
short of a length, just outside off, Shehzad defends off the back foot
short of a length, wide, left alone
fuller but still not driving length. Shehzad defends from the crease
tucked away off the hip as Yadav stays short
good ball. He pitches up finally, gets swing away, and beats the tentative Khan
short of a length, angling in, defended to leg by Khan
short of a length again, beats Shehzad for pace, and hits him in the midriff
he has left it alone for a single to third man. A late decision to withdraw from this outswinger, and runs this off the face of the bat to third man
short of a length, hits the inside half of Khan's bat
stays short of a length, gets it to shape away from outside off. Bowled at 146ks. Left alone
fuller, widish outside off, Khan is watchful. Leaves it be
short of a length, seaming away, helped along to third man for one
full and straight, there is a moment of excitement as Khan has moved across, but the bat comes down and he has taken it from off to clip it past midwicket for four
squares him up as Younis plays at this short-of-a-length ball outside off. Gets a single off the outside edge
short and wide, and he gets away with it. Shehzad finds the fielder at point. This is bowled at 148ks
short of a length, outside off, holds its line, 143ks, defended to point
and there is the usual one bad ball of the over. Clipped away off the pads for two. He has got away with two bad balls that have gone for just two runs
short of a length, a touch too straight, but Shehzad can't beat midwicket
moves across to almost get inside the line of one outside off. Ends up defending this back to Shami

oh sharp bouncer. That will be sweet to India who are usually the ones who struggle against bouncers. Khan has moved across even before the ball is delivered. Shami gets one in aimed at Khan's head. He is in position. He is ducking but can't duck. He is pulling but can't pull. The hands move in slow motion for the pull, and the ball hits the glove to lob up to Dhoni
pushed wide of mid-on where M Sharma misfields to allow a second
on a length, shaping in towards the top of off. Defended from the crease
dug in short, outside off, seams away after pitching, called a wide
on a length, middle and leg, angling away, defended outside off
fuller, angling towards off, defended to mid-on
short of a length, into the body, bunted wide of midwicket for a single
not in total control of the cut but this is short and wide and deserves a four. Flies through third man
fuller, straighter, defended respectfully by H Sohail
full and straight, watchfully played again
bouncer, but too short and too high, and Dhoni has to pull off an acrobatic take
full, a leg-side half-volley, and he has clipped it off the toes for a four through midwicket
lovely cover-drive. Beautiful shot. On a length, angling away from around off, and he just meets it with an open face. Crisply played through cover
short of a length, into the pads, worked for a single towards midwicket
anther beautiful shot. Short of a length, just outside off, punched away off the back foot, between cover and cover-point. No real power. Just timing
digs this one in short, and angles it too far down the leg side
fuller, slightly slower ball, at 133ks, allowing it to swing a little. Left alone outside off
on a length, shaping in towards off, defended with an open face towards point
well bowled. On a length, holds its line against the angle, and Sohail pushes inside the line of it. Beaten
another bouncer, too high, and too far down the leg. Dhoni has to pull out the acrobatics again. Another wide

Dhoni has missed a run-out. That might be a first. Sohail has run this to third man and wants to come back for the second. Shehzad doesn't. Dhoni doesn't even collect the ball properly. If he collects it here and lobs it to the bowler, Sohail is gone for all money. He breaks the wicket at the striker's end but Shehzad is safe at that end. Dhoni is not even aware of the opportunity at the non-striker's end. More surprising is, I didn't hear anybody shouting to Dhoni: bowler's end, bowler's end
short of a length, outside off, defended
no-ball from Sharma. He bowls hundreds of them in the nets. On top of that he has started round the wicket
tries the bouncer with the free hit, Sohail makes room and fore-hands this over mid-off for two
length ball, angling in, defended to leg
half-volley outside off, crunched away, but can't beat cover
short of a length, angling in, worked to leg but can't beat square leg
wide half-volley, driven and extra cover has got a hand on it while diving, saving two runs
on a length, on off, Shehzad defends
short and wide, he rides the bounce and punches but can't beat the man at point
good bouncer. Shehzad sees it is too high for his attempted pull and bails out of it at the last moment. Dhoni collects it in front of his face. Called one for the over
one bouncer too many. Shehzad is in position early, and crunches this away past midwicket for four
wide again. Starts too wide and moves away too
on a length, on off, defended from the crease
on a length, just outside off, defended off the back foot
short of a length, just outside off, defended with a slightly open face
fuller, angling in, Sohail pushes off the front foot. To mid-off
short of a length, angling in, turned to square leg
short of a length, outside off, punched to short cover where Raina makes a diving save to draw a big cheer from the crowd
strays onto the pads but he has protection deep on the leg side
beauty from Sharma. On a length, just outside off, holds its line, Shehzad plays the angle, and is beaten
short of a length, outside off, pushed to Raina at short cover
full, outside off, driven to the right of extra cover for one
short of a length, plays a soft pull with the front leg in the air. Can't beat midwicket
on a length, outside off, pushed to cover
short of a length, Shehzad flicks it straight to mid-on
this shortish ball stops at Shehzad who has to check the punch shot and can't beat short cover

short of a length, wide, but India have packed that cover ring. Dhoni will be happy these two have bowled to that field in the last four overs. He will be livid if he concedes a boundary through the on side
short of a length, outside off, and again played to point. That cover ring is keeping the runs down
he has bowled one on the pads but he has a deep midwicket to keep them down to one
short of a length, punched well but straight to mid-off
slower ball, on a length, just outside off, defended from the crease
bouncer, Shehzad ducks under it, is looking for a wide but doesn't get the call. Does seem to surprise him, both the ball and the call from the umpires
tossed up outside off, defended with an open face
flighted again, pushed to long-off for one
slightly flat, and he goes back to punch this in front of cover and wide of long-off to come back for the second
slightly short, slightly flat, and he is quick to go back and place this between the two men in the covers
this one provides him no room, and he punches this back to Raina
tossed up, overpitches it, and concedes a single to long-off
short of a length, outside off, punched straight to short cover
contempt. Pure contempt. Dances down the wicket and pulls Sharma out of his sight. Over midwicket he goes. Clean as
slower ball, 110ks, short of a length, draws an uppish punch from him. Falls well short of mid-off
down the wicket again, and is yorker by Sharma. Good comeback by Sharma
on a length, pretty accurate, pushed to mid-on
slower ball, and he drives it to Ashwin at mid-on and takes him on. Takes the single easily. Should never have been that easy
offbreak from wide on the crease, defended to square leg
another similar offbreak, played to midwicket
flatter, might have been the carrom ball, punched back to him
sharp turn on that offbreak, played to square leg. Four dots
He has bowled a seam-up ball that swings away. That is definitely a variation he has added in the months he has spent outside the team on this tour. Defended to cover
back to offbreak, and the defensive push brings out a maiden over
into the pads with a strong off-side field, concedes a couple to the right of deep square
on a length, outside off, defended to mid-off
on a length but wide, opens the face on it, gets a single to third man
Shehzad is shaping up for the big one. You can see he is jumpy. But gets no room here, and curbs the big shot to defend this to cover
that should release the pressure. Shehzad picks the slower ball early, and launches this half-volley over mid-off for four. He has slugged it
another slower ball, 106ks, another muscular slug, mis-timed this time, but it clears mid-off
and he has let him off first ball with a flat ball into the pads. Easy single ensues
tries the big sweep, the offreak means he ends up dragging it behind square, but gets the single
nice offbreak, middle and off, holds its line, but they steal a single off the soft inside edge into the on side. They are quicker than Dhoni is
bowls the flatter quicker one that is short and wide, but Shehzad finds the man at cover
he gets inside the line, plays around the front pad, glances it towards leg slip, but controls it, and gets a single just wide of the man
shortish, and punched to long-off for one
angling in, flat, gets a single to long-on
full and flat, driven to long-off for one
short of a length, into the pads, easy single to long-on
speared into the off stumps, defended to cover
short again, punched to deep cover for one
short, flat, no body behind the ball, punched between the two men at covers. Dhawan gives a spirited chase to keep them down to three
flighted on off, defended off the front foot
another offbreak, gives it some hang time, defend to cover
flatter, quicker, Sohail goes back to defend
more air, more turn outside off, 86ks, defended with an open face
flatter this time, punched away, but straight to point

and Ashwin has bowled a wicket-maiden. Big breakthrough. Through a regulation classical offbreak. There is some drift, it pitches middle and leg, short of his reach, and then Sohail panics as he sees it turn sharply. He stabs at the ball with his hands following the ball, worried if he has exposed the stumps. The sharp edge is taken sharply by Raina at slip. Ashwin has bowled superbly so far
flighted on off, defended off the front foot
flighted outside off, driven to short cover
short, flat, cut away wide of deep cover for two
down the wicket, beaten in the flight, defends it back to Jadeja
overpitched, but he has hit this back to Jadeja. This should have been an easy single

this is pure genius by Dhoni. You just can't rule this man out. This is short and wide, and is cut away wide of deep cover. Shehzad comes back for the second, the throw is wide, and for every other wicketkeeper there wouldn't have been an opportunity here. He doesn't collect it. He is three yeards down the wicket when he meets the ball, but he deflects it on the stumps. This is just wonderful. Shehzad, though, has not taken anything for granted, and dives. The toe of the bat is in the air, but the middle of the bat has just about crossed the line when the bail comes off
oh Misbah. Premeditated sweep first ball. Beaten outside off
slightly short, punched down to mid-on for one
flighted on middle and off, defended to midwicket
Ashwin bowls that flatter quicker ball, gives him the length and the width to work with and with no fielder deep on the off side. Dhoni is clearly not happy
down the wicket, mid-off is up, and Shehzad chips this over that man. Superb batting to counterattack Ashwin who was settling into great rhythm. But the turnaround has begun with that variation
offbreak, into the pads, defended to leg
flighted outside off, driven to long-off for one
short of a length, flat, the punch fails to beat the man at point
flighted outside off, pushed to short cover
flatter, punched to short cover again
round-arm delivery, totally flat, driven wide of deep cover for two
flat and quick, no menace, Shehzad opens the face, Kohli's dive at short third man saves two runs for India
moves across to play this off-stump half-volley to leg for one
full, on off, pushed to short cover, they are both in their respective creases despite a yes and a no
on a length, on off, defended from the crease
on a length, into the pads, pushed to midwicket, and Shehzad sets off for a non-existent single again. Sent back in time
short and wide, and Shehzad is beaten on the cut
and Shehzad takes the risk, charging at Yadav, drives this hard back down the wicket, and Yadav does well to get a hand to it
full outside off, driven to deep cover for one
short of a length, punched to deep cover. Pakistan get to 100
driven but can't beat cover
on a length, on off, pushed to the left of Jadeja who pulls out a dive to deny them the single
short and flat, but he has failed to beat the backward point
flighted on middle and leg, driven to long-on
short of a length, tucked away off the hip for one

short and wide, and Shehzad has picked out Jadeja who has nearly dropped him. That is the lucky break India needed. This is a bad ball. It has been absolutely creamed but Shehzad has failed to keep it down. Jadeja lets it pop out, but he keeps his eye on it, and takes the rebound with the left hand
short of a length, outside off, defended off the back foot

Yadav has got another. A nervous, poor shot from Maqsood. There is a wide slip in place, and Maqsood goes chasing at a wide shortish ball. He has not smashed it. He has played a meek push with a bat that is neither horizontal nor vertical. Raina takes the easy catch at slip
full and straight. Defended from the crease
short of a length, outside off, left alone
flighted outside off, pushed to short cover
flat, into the pads, worked wide of midwicket for one
flat, quick ball, defended from the crease

Dhoni has reviewed this. Sharp turn for Jadeja on a quick delivery. Akmal is forward, is beaten by the turn, Dhoni thinks he has edged it, and goes up immediately after breaking the wicket. He is dead sure there is an edge. The stumping was just to be sure. Not given by the umpire. The ball seams to have altered its path a smidgen as it passes the bat, but there is hardly a spike on the snicko. We don't know what long discussion between Kettleborough and the third umpire is, but he has reversed his decision in the end. Was there enough evidence to overturn the on-field call? Maybe not. Did I instinctively think there was an edge? Maybe yes
punches a length ball away to deep cover
tossed up outside off, driven to long-off for one
short, rises towards his chin, fended off his toes
short of a length, wide, cut to third man for one
bouncer from Yadav, Afridi ducks under it. Bowled at 138ks. Has clipped his helmet on the way
short of a length, outside, Misbah drops it at his toes and rushes through for one
on a length, on off, pushed wide of mid-on for one
short of a length, wide, cut away wide of deep cover
on a length, some turn, defended from the crease
driven to long-off for one
short square boundary. Afridi takes it on. Rocks back to pull thos short ball for six over midwicket
goes inside out, over cover, reaches Kohli there on the half-volley. Good effort by Kohli but he can't get there on the full. Makes sure his hands are behind it, though
driven to long-off for one
full, on off, he defends this to midwicket
short of a length, played straight to that midwicket again
short, Misbah shapes for the cut, but the sharp turn back in cramps him up
flighted offbreak, some drift away too, beats him outside off
flatter, seam-up delivery that shapes away, defended back to him
third maiden from Ashwin as he pitches this short of a length, and has it defended back to him
startes with a slow ball, 111ks, defended to cover
bouncer, doesn't quite come on, Afridi is through with his pull before it arrives
yorker, dug out towards mid-on for one
moves across to get inside the line of this full delivery, and gets a single to deep square leg
slower ball, not giving Afridi anything. He plays sensibly, opens the face, takes the single
short of a length, wide, punched to the right of third man for a couple
nice dipping offbreak, worked to leg for one
tossed up, dipping, turning in, Misbah gets inside the line and defends
sharp turn as Misbah moves inside the line, but the punch beats leg slip
more turn, punched to square leg for one
quick flat ball, Afridi sweeps this powerfully between deep midwicket and deep square. He has played this all along the ground
slows it down, Afridi covers the offbreak and defends
short of a length, wide, pushed to point
on a length, outside off, pushed to cover
short of a length, Misbah wants to pull, is hurried into it, gets a single off the bottom edge
slower ball, whipped away, but not past midwicket
pulled away hard to deep square leg for one
slower ball, full outside off, defended to cover
slightly short, pulled away towards deep midwicket for one
short of a length, wide, punched away to deep cover for one
quick ball, speared in absolutely, he plays it back to Jadeja
swept from well outside off for a single to deep square
tossed up outside off, defended as it turns a little
slows it down again, Misbah plays it well in front of himself, and defends
yorker, down the leg side, dug out for one
bouncer, at 142ks, Misbah is surprised and ducks under it
slower short ball, and it does get big on him, Misbah is on his toes to fend at it
makes room and drives at a full ball, but can't beat the man at cover. Four-men cover ring in place with no cover behind them
moves across this time, and tries to pull this shortish ball. Mis-hits this to mid-on
another big hit mistimed, and gets just a single to mid-on. Struggling for the touch
Misbah finall gets his timing right. Half-volley into the pads, but he makes room and drives it through cover. Yorker gone wrong
yorker is right this time, driven hard, but straight to mid-off
yorker gone wrong again. This is a full toss, Misbah goes deep in the crease, and flicks it wide of short fine leg
he has moved across even before the ball is released. Yadav digs it in short. Misbah gets a bottom edge for a single as he tries to cut it
short and wide, muscle away, but can't beat cover. Gets a single through a fumble from R Sharma
played to cover this time

Kohli takes a special catch. Afridi is making room, gets a thigh-high full toss, which he tries to smash, gets a thick top edge over the covers. Kohli runs back. Gets under it. Has almost overrun this. Slows himself down. Takes this over his shoulder and dives. He comes up and celebrates with his arms spread out. Almost like Afridi. Maybe exactly like Afridi. Maybe on purpose
half-volley outside off, driven to deep cover for one
down the leg side, concedes four as Riaz gets a deflection on it
another one bites the dust. Short, wide, looks to cut, gets the edge
defends a shortish delivery back to him
full and straight, pushed to mid-on
slog sweep first ball. Big six. Misbah doing what he is used to doing. Trying to rescue a burning deck
quicker ball, stays back to work this to leg, and turns down a single
quicker one, down leg, Misbah stays inside the line to take the wide
short and wide, cut away past cover for a couple
legbreak from Ashwin this time. Too short. Worked to leg. This time he will take the single
flighted outside off, played with an open face for a single
Ashwin trying out his variations now that the match is almost over. Another legbreak, but this is a long hop and is cut away for four
full and straight, hit to mid-on for a single
lovely shot. Full on off, and he stands back to drill it over mid-off for four
slower short ball, he rides the bounce to guide this wide of point for a couple that brings up his fifty. Yet again the boy on the burning deck
moves across to get inside the line of this low full toss, and just crunches it past midwicket for four
slower ball outside off, beats Misbah after he has shuffled across
full and wide, driven to deep cover for one
fast and straight, defended to cover
slower this time, Misbah presses forward to defend
full and flat, driven to long-on for one
tossed up outside off, opens the face on it, guides it past slip for a couple
quicker, flatter, middle and leg. Defended back to him
full, just outside off, gets a thick outside edge to point
short, wide, slower ball, called a wide even though Misbah has backed away. Slightly harsh, I'd say. It has gone over that white line
dances down the wicket, is surprised by this ball that gets big on him
backs away, moves across, Yadav remains short of a length and outside off. Misbah can't do anything with it
slower short ball, hit into the covers for a single
short of a length, outside off, fended to cover
cut away in the air, but wide enough of point
pulled away after moving inside its line, gets a single to deep square leg
backs away a long way but Jadeja stays accurate. Hit straight to cover
plays the reverse sweep this time, and places it between slip and point for four
flatter, short of a length, punched to long-off for one
quick turning delivery, defended from the crease
quick full ball, defended off the back foot. Gets a single wide of cover
tries the big slog sweep as Jadeja slows this down. Early into the shot, and is beaten by the turn. The ball misses the stumps by a whisker
short of a length, into the hip, beats him for pace, hits him in the rib cage as he gets on his toes
short of a length, outside off, pushed to cover
big wide down the leg side. Good job he bowled only at 140ks or this would have gone for five wides
tucked away off the hip but doesn't get the single as Raina's dive from square leg keeps them in their respective creases
that's a mean bouncer, Yasir just throws his hands up in self defence, and gloves this to fine leg
slower short ball, whipped to midwicket, but gets no run
makes too much room and is beaten by a full ball outside off. Smart bowling by Yadav
flighted outside off, Shah defends off the front foot
Ashwin tosses this wide, and Shah slog-sweeps it over midwicket for four
slightly short but Shah's pull is defeated by the sharp turn
some dip as Ashwin bowls this full and hits his pad. Missing leg
big sharp offbreak from wide on the crease, beats his sweep, but can't get the lbw with the ball turning so much
quick and skiddy, hit straight to cover
slower ball, just outside off, pushed to point with an open face
slower bouncer, Misbah is flummoxed and watches it balloon through to Dhoni
finally gets a shot by moving deep into the crease and going across, but gets just a single to deep midwicket
bouncer, pulled away towards deep midwicket, Shami charges in, dives forward, but can't take the catch. Almost doesn't carry either
Shah goes. Drills this length ball straight down the throat of mid-on. Two strikes away from the inevitable
on a length, on off, defended back to him. Doesn't look interested in getting behind the line
shortish, cut away to cover
played to mid-on
slogs this full ball over midwicket for four
moves well across, takes this from well outside off, and sweeps this through the vacant square leg
he has nearly set himself up for an lbw. Nearly a yorker as he has gone too far across, but the bat comes down in time, and the sweep beats midwicket
yorker, middle and off, dug out to cover
bouncer from Yadav, Sohail ducks under it
short of a length, quite straight, defended to leg
wide down the leg side as Yadav tries to bounce him. Actually not called a wide. Even the umpires seem in a hurry to end this no-contest
short, outside off, Sohail has pulled this away, between mid-on and midwicket
wide this time at least. A big one too. Dhoni is not happy with the drop in intensity
bouncer, straight, Sohail ducks it
another bouncer. Sohail ducks under it again
moves inside the line early, Shami bounces him, Misbah doesn't play the hook
another bouncer, it gets big on Misbah, but the mis-hit doesn't carry to deep midwicket. He turns down the single
makes room to try to go over cover. He has made too much room and can't connect well
and Misbah misses the century again. A good bouncer. Over his left shoulder. Head high. All Misbah manages is a lob to mid-on
another bouncer. The thing with bowling them to Irfan is, you will never be called. Irfan sways out of its line
short ball, Irfan avoids it, and India have bowled another wicket-maiden
slower ball, into the pads, clipped away wide of short of fine leg for two
full outside off, pushed to cover
short, outside off, Irfan doesn't want to have anything to do with it
on a length, middle and leg, pushed to long-on
it's all over. India make it 6-0 in World Cups against Pakistan. Slower ball, Sohail mis-hits it, and is caught at long-on
